📋 Methodology & Data Quality

  • Data Sources: MTGOData listener (match results) + Cache (decklists)
  • Analysis Method: By MATCHES (not by decks) - following Jiliac methodology
  • Period: July 1-21, 2025 (Standard format only)
  • Exclusions: Leagues and casual events
  • Confidence Intervals: Wilson score method (95% confidence)
  • Match Coverage: 88% of tournaments successfully matched
